committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution authorizing the President to proclaim annually a week during the first ten days in May as "Pacific/Asian American Heritage Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate annually a week in the first ten days of May as "Pacific/Asian American Heritage Week."

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President to proclaim annually a week during the first ten days in May as "Pacific/Asian American Heritage Week".
